summary: Allows you to fine-tune your object\'s position without worrying about clunky controls or collisions.
descriptionHtml:
[b]= Description =[/b]
This mod allows you to move and rotate an item without it being held, and without worrying about collisions.

To use this, you must first grab an item and hold it. Once you are holding it, press the SEMICOLON key. Release the object, and you will find it floating in the air. You can then use the arrow keys to move it along the X and Y axises, and page up/down to move it along the Z axis. If you hold ALT, it will rotate the object instead of moving it. If you hold SHIFT, it will rotate/move the object 10x faster. When you are done, hit SEMICOLON again, and it will behave normally again.

Every key and value is 100% customizable via the included ini file.

[b]= Requirements =[/b]
This plugin requires [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon]Script Dragon[/url] in order to function.

[b]= Installation =[/b]
Copy the .asi and .ini file into your <skyrim>\\asi folder, NOT into your data folder.
That\'s it!

[b]= Uninstalling =[/b]
Delete decoratorAssist.asi and decoratorAssist.ini from the install directory.

[b]= Frequently Asked Questions =[/b]
Q: Is Script Dragon/this mod compatible with Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)?
A: Yes, 100%. Keep in mind that this mod requires Script Dragon, not SKSE.

Q: This mod doesn\'t work!
A: Post in the comments and I\'ll try to help you. Please post the version of Skyrim you are using, the version of the mod that you are using (please update to the latest! Redownload if you are unsure), and any relevant information.

[b]= Credits =[/b]
Alexander Blade, for authoring Script Dragon.

[b]= Contact =[/b]
NullCascade on the [url=http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums]Bethesda forums[/url] or Lordrea on the Nexus sites. Please let me know of any bugs or improvements.

[b]= Source =[/b]
All of my modifications are released under public domain, except where another\'s code is embedded. If you have a question, please feel free to contact me.

The source files can be found at [url=https://github.com/NullCascade/Null-s-Elder-Scrolls-Modifications]my GitHub page[/url].

[b]= Change Log =[/b]
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Now works on both Skyrim v1.1 and v1.2. Items no longer blink, and the rare duplication bug should be fixed.
1.2 - Fixed a minor bug, added Skyrim v1.3 support.
author: NullCascade
